price: Badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu, yeye huomba kisicho mdhuru wala kumnufaisha. Huko ndiko kupotolea mbali!
arabic: يَدۡعُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُۥ وَمَا لَا يَنفَعُهُۥۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلضَّلَٰلُ ٱلۡبَعِيدُ
footnotes: Mwenye kukhasiri hivi humuacha Mwenyezi Mungu na akayaabudu masanamu yasiyo weza kumdhuru pindi akito yaabudu, wala hayamfai kitu pindi akiyaabudu. Kitendo chake huyo ndio kupotelea mbali na haki na uwongofu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yadʿū min dūni al-lahi mā lā yaḍurruhu wamā lā yanfaʿuhu dhālika huwa al-ḍalālu al-baʿīdu
